channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boeing marked up soap dispensers by 8,000% amid $1 million in overcharges for Air Force, audit says
item.description: The Pentagon's Office of the Inspector General said it reviewed the soap dispenser prices after getting a hotline tip. Boeing disputed the findings.

item.title: Unlocking Stock Market Success: Why You Should Embrace the Skew
item.description: By learning to appreciate positive skew and its associated tail events, investors can unlock the full potential of stock market gains.

item.title: Supreme Court rejects RNC request to halt Pennsylvania's counting of provisional ballots
item.description: The Supreme Court on Friday rejected a request from Republicans to halt the counting of provisional ballots in the key swing state of Pennsylvania.

item.title: Unearthed documents contradict vulnerable House Democrat's rhetoric about championing eviction ban
item.description: Dem. Rep Marcy Kaptur has filed multiple eviction petitions against her tenants despite vocally pushing for an eviction moratorium and defending squat...

item.title: Voters Should Reject Pro-Abortion Deception This November
item.description: They should not assent to the abortion industry’s demand for a radical regime of unsafe, unregulated, and unrestricted abortion.

item.title: Harris says Trump is 'out for unchecked power' in penultimate pitch to Wisconsin voters

item.title: The Hidden Environmental Costs of Tech Giants’ AI Investments
item.description: Big tech is spending big on AI technologies. Training and operating them has raised concerns about environmental impact. What disclosures should susta...

item.title: You might be overdoing it on protein and not getting enough of another vital nutrient, dietitians say
item.description: If you're eating enough during the day, you're likely meeting or exceeding your protein needs, experts say.

item.title: Trump doubles down on chicken-hawk comments about Liz Cheney at Michigan rally

item.title: Democrats’ Liz Cheney Hoax Is Another Desperate Attempt To ‘Disqualify’ Trump From The White House
item.description: The last-minute media hysteria comes as Trump picks up momentum across the polls in the final hours before Election Day.

item.title: Nvidia will replace Intel on the Dow Jones Industrial Average in historic changing of the guard in chip sector
item.description: The addition of Nvidia will take effect on Nov. 8, marking a historic moment for the industry, as rival Intel has been on the Dow index since 1999.

item.title: The Infuriating Case of a Chicago Synagogue-Goer’s Shooting

item.title: Wall Street’s Latest Flood: Private Credit
item.description: Private credit is a treacherous swamp full of opportunists. Is your consultant capable of defying the formidable odds of success?

item.title: From Tweets to Trades: The Risks of Social Media in Investing
item.description: Are you able to step outside the confines of social media echo chambers to make informed investment decisions?

item.title: Could your cough be walking pneumonia? Here are the symptoms of the spiking bacterial illness
item.description: Infections tend to be most common among older children and adolescents but in 2024 have been rampant among young children, the CDC says.

item.title: Harris holds raucous rally in Wisconsin with Cardi B, music stars
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris on Friday held a raucous concert in suburban Milwaukee with just four days to go until Election Day.

item.title: Don’t avoid the end-of-life talk with your aging parents. Here’s how to start the conversation
item.description: Expert advice on how to approach a difficult, but necessary topic.

item.title: Corporate Media’s Shameless Liz Cheney Hoax Is What Real ‘Disinformation’ Looks Like
item.description: The most outrageous hoax yet shows no lie is too lazy for America's propaganda press.

item.title: Kamala Harris Sells Faux Unity — Yet Again
item.description: The Biden-Harris vision of unity is that Donald Trump goes away.

item.title: Trump clarifies he meant Cheney wouldn’t have ‘guts’ to fight a war with rifle comment after Dem backlash
item.description: Former President Trump Friday defended his comments calling former Rep. Liz Cheney a "war hawk," wondering how she'd feel if she had gun barrels "shoo...

item.title: Trump’s ‘Chickenhawk’ Attack on His GOP Critics Is Dumb, but Not Evil
item.description: Far from being craven warmongers, Liz Cheney, John Bolton, and other Republicans Trump and his supporters loathe advocate stable deterrence.

item.title: Citing poor jobs report, Trump says the Harris economy is 'a disaster'
item.description: Donald Trump said Friday that the economy "stinks" under the Biden-Harris administration, and a new jobs report proves it.

item.title: Here’s A List Of Every Garbage Journalist Who Lied About Trump’s Liz Cheney Chickenhawk Comments
item.description: Jonah Goldberg may have been the worst offender, but he was hardly the only one.

item.title: Leftist Group Threatens Michigan Voters: ‘We Will Be Reviewing’ Your Voting Record
item.description: The left-wing Voter Participation Center sent Michigan residents, including a reporter for The Federalist, letters with threatening language.

item.title: Over 150,000 veterans and military family members recruited to staff polling places for Election Day
item.description: Vet the Vote has expanded its recruitment efforts nationwide among veterans and military families to staff polling places ahead of Election Day.

item.title: Leftist Groups Turn To Threats To Get Out The Vote
item.description: Maryland's attorney general is warning the Voter Participation Center to stop sending 'threatening' mailers to residents.
